channel.title: [Solved] How to install Wine on Whonix?
channel.description: I've been trying to do install wine on my whonix vm to no success so far. I have scoured the net and found no clear answers so far, could somebody give me a step by step guide to installing wine in whonix? any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: [Solved] How to install Wine on Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
For this particular question, since Whonix is based on Debian, any instructions for Debian will also work for Whonix. And since Ubuntu is also based on Debian, most Ubuntu instructions also work for Whonix.

I am not a wine user, but what more than

sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install wine
should be required?

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] How to install Wine on Whonix?
